title: 'FIA must ban Verstappen – now' – Going Up, Going Down in Spain
summary: When will the FIA take serious action against dangerous F1 driving? asksJames Elson

qa_pairs.question: What does FIA stand for in the context of Formula 1?
Which driver has been frequently associated with controversial driving incidents in recent seasons?
What is the primary role of the FIA in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To regulate and oversee the sport's rules and safety standards
